definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">give @p splash_potion{CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:6,Amplifier:125}],CustomPotionColor:11141120,HideFlags:127,display:{Name:"{"text":"§0§k1§r§4Potion Of Instant Death§0§k1","bold":"false","italic":"false"}", Lore:['{"text":"Will instantly kill anything it is thrown upon","bold":"false","italic":"false"}']}}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
